content: Pew-Thian Yap, PhD | UNC Department of Radiology Skip to main content Search_for: Search Search this site Search UNC School of Medicine Home / Directory Entries / Pew-Thian Yap, PhD Pew-Thian Yap, PhD â€“ UNC Department of Radiology UNC Department of Radiology Pew-Thian Yap, PhD Associate Chair of Basic Science Research Co-Director of Radiological Sciences Faculty Development Director of Image Analysis Core of Biomedical Research Imaging Center (BRIC) Professor Contact Information ptyap@med.unc.edu Office: 919-843-8712 Pew-Thian Yap, PhD Associate Chair of Basic Science Research Co-Director of Radiological Sciences Faculty Development Director of Image Analysis Core of Biomedical Research Imaging Center (BRIC) Professor About Dr. Pew-Thian Yap is a Professor of the Department of Radiology and the Director of the Image Analysis Core of the Biomedical Research Imaging Center (BRIC) at the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill. He leads a wide range of research spanning image acquisition, reconstruction, quality control, harmonization, processing, and analysis with applications in neuroscience, disease diagnosis, and surgical planning. Doctorate University of Malaya, Malaysia Postdoctoral Fellow Nanyang Technological University, Singapore Postdoctoral Research Associate University of North Carolina
